name: qwerty ui
description:
qwerty is a "roguelite" memory game that wasn't really supposed to be a "game" in the first place.

gameplay:

remember and type a continuously growing string of random items!

earn points and buy upgrades to help you on your attempts!

difficulty settings for replayability and randomness!

why/how i made this: 

i just wanted to make some cute art and animate it, and put them on a screen all together and move them around... but as i was adding things and testing it, i found it quiet challenging to even remember all the stuff a added previously.. and thus the "game" part was born!

let's fight dementia, together :)

i feel like this game isn't much, but it's become something much bigger than i ever expected <3
